fields.name: DatabaseName
fields.description: The database name for which access is being granted for this Role Definition.

fields.name: Privileges
fields.description: A set of privileges contained by the Role Definition. This will allow application of this Role Definition on the entire database account or any underlying Database / Collection. Scopes higher than Database are not enforceable as privilege.

fields.name: RoleName
fields.description: A user-friendly name for the Role Definition. Must be unique for the database account.

fields.name: Roles
fields.description: The set of roles inherited by this Role Definition.

fields.name: Type
fields.description: Indicates whether the Role Definition was built-in or user created.
